Metadata: Seeking Professional Help with Emotional Stress and Strain
OSU Fishing Families Project: Practical ways of adapting to changes in commercial fishing.

When fishing families confront economic, personal, and social stresses, it can be a scary and painful time for all family members. Getting help from a trained professional can be a practical step toward building a better life. This four-page brochure discusses what such help might do for fishing families, how to find the right support person, and how to pay for therapy.
